snippet.title: Blue Portals Test Chamber Walkthrough Part 1/4 "Chambers 00-05"
snippet.description:
Here is a walkthrough of a new Portal mod called "Blue Portals" . 

  This mod consist of 10 test cambers and is meant for those who've played Portal for quite some time. You need to be fast, skillful and patient while playing these test chambers.

  In my personal opinion the mod was kind of easy at some points, but I've never been too good at time trials and this mod has a lot of them. 

  This mod includes:
Custom sounds 
Custom models
Custom Textures
Ten full Test Chambers
New testing elements
A wider variety of "Weighted Storage Cubes"
A new and unique environment for Portal maps

Watch and enjoy! 

Subscribe to me here:  
http://www.youtube.com/user/RubyCarbuncIe

Watch Part 2 here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wG42u_iBHBo&feature=related
Watch Part 3 here:
Coming Soon!

Subscribe to the creator of the mod here:
http://www.youtube.com/user/reepblue

Watch the trailer here:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=biRQyYYFhYk

Download the mod from here:
http://www.moddb.com/mods/blue-portals/downloads

And remember to vote for this mod for mod of the year if you like it!
